spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Asha is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). Asha has the following cleric spells prepared:

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Asha's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 11}). Asha can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Divine Eminence
entries: As a bonus action, Asha can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Asha expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Asha has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Asha to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Asha has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage.
